verses.roman:
ei-mata mahāprabhu bhakta-gaṇa-saṅge
nīlācale vāsa karena kṛṣṇa-prema-raṅge

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhakta-gaṇa-saṅge—along with His devotees; nīlācale—at Jagannātha Purī; vāsa karena—resides; kṛṣṇa-prema-raṅge—overwhelmed by the ecstatic love of Lord Kṛṣṇa.
translation: Thus Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu lived at Nīlācala [Jagannātha Purī] with His personal devotees, always merged in ecstatic love for Kṛṣṇa.
